document.full_text: a u.s. judge on wednesday allowed john hinckley, the man who tried to assassinate president ronald reagan, additional visits away from the psychiatric hospital where he is being treated.
document.title: reagan shooter gets more time away from hospital
lines_and_colors: a u.s. judge on wednesday allowed john hinckley, the man who tried to assassinate president ronald reagan, additional visits away from the psychiatric hospital where he is being treated.
